# Select PR template

Please go the the `Preview` tab and select the appropriate sub-template:

- [New feature 🎉](?expand=1&template=feature.md)

- [Bugfix 🐛](?expand=1&template=fixes.md)

- [Tests 🧪](?expand=1&template=tests.md)

- [Documentation 📖](?expand=1&template=docs.md)

- [Other 💬](?expand=1&template=new-package.md)

---

## For Code Owners

- [New package 📦](?expand=1&template=new-package.md)
